#summary Here you can find all the custom filters and actions in use in the last version of the plugin

= Filters =

In this filters the post object is passed as second parameter for advanced customization.

Single items
  * *ffff_content ($content, $post)*. Filter the content of every item
  * *ffff_title ($title, $post)*. Filter the title of every item 

Digest posts
  * *ffff_digest_title ($title, $digest_post)*. Filter the title of every digest post
  * *ffff_digest_content ($content, $digest_post)*. Filter the content of every digest post
